trans-unit.source: query_string (Required) - Indicates whether you want CloudFront to forward query strings to the origin that is associated with this cache behavior.
trans-unit.target: query_string （必需）-指示您是否要CloudFront将查询字符串转发到与此缓存行为关联的源。

trans-unit.source: query_string_blacklist - (Optional) Names of query string parameters to exclude in cache keys. All other parameters will be included. Either specify query_string_whitelist or query_string_blacklist, not both. '&' and '=' will be percent encoded and not treated as delimiters.
trans-unit.target: query_string_blacklist -（可选）要在缓存键中排除的查询字符串参数的名称。所有其他参数都将包括在内。请指定 query_string_whitelist 或 query_string_blacklist ，不能两者都指定。“＆”和“ =”将按百分比编码，不视为定界符。

trans-unit.source: query_string_cache_keys (Optional) - When specified, along with a value of true for query_string, all query strings are forwarded, however only the query string keys listed in this argument are cached. When omitted with a value of true for query_string, all query string keys are cached.
trans-unit.target: query_string_cache_keys （可选） -当指定，值一起 true 的 query_string ，所有的查询字符串被转发，但只查询字符串这种说法上市密钥缓存。当用的值忽略 true 的 query_string ，所有的查询字符串键缓存。

trans-unit.source: query_string_whitelist - (Optional) Names of query string parameters to include in cache keys. All other parameters will be excluded. Either specify query_string_whitelist or query_string_blacklist, not both. '&' and '=' will be percent encoded and not treated as delimiters.
trans-unit.target: query_string_whitelist -（可选）要包含在缓存键中的查询字符串参数的名称。所有其他参数将被排除。请指定 query_string_whitelist 或 query_string_blacklist ，不能两者都指定。“＆”和“ =”将按百分比编码，不视为定界符。

trans-unit.source: querystring_caching_behaviour - (Optional) Sets query string caching behavior. Allowed values are IgnoreQueryString, BypassCaching and UseQueryString. Defaults to IgnoreQueryString.
trans-unit.target: querystring_caching_behaviour -（可选）设置查询字符串缓存行为。允许的值为 IgnoreQueryString ， BypassCaching 和 UseQueryString 。默认为 IgnoreQueryString 。

trans-unit.source: redirect_all_requests_to - (Optional) A hostname to redirect all website requests for this bucket to. Hostname can optionally be prefixed with a protocol (http:// or https://) to use when redirecting requests. The default is the protocol that is used in the original request.
trans-unit.target: redirect_all_requests_to -（可选）用于将该存储桶的所有网站请求重定向到的主机名。主机名可以有选择地加上协议（ http:// 或 https:// ）的前缀，以便在重定向请求时使用。默认值为原始请求中使用的协议。

trans-unit.source: redirect_http_to_https - (Optional) A boolean value indicating whether HTTP requests to the Load Balancer on port 80 will be redirected to HTTPS on port 443. Default value is false.
trans-unit.target: redirect_http_to_https -（可选）一个布尔值，指示是否将对端口80上的负载均衡器的HTTP请求重定向到端口443上的HTTPS。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: redirects - (Optional) The maximum number of HTTP Location header redirects to follow. Default 0.
trans-unit.target: redirects -（可选）要遵循的HTTP Location 标头重定向的最大数量。默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: redirects - (Optional) The maximum number of HTTP Location header redirects to follow. Default 0.
trans-unit.target: redirects -（可选）要遵循的HTTP Location 标头重定向的最大数量。默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: redirectType (Required) One of 'Hidden Frame Masked', 'Standard 301', or 'Standard 302'
trans-unit.target: redirectType （必需）“隐藏的蒙版帧”，“标准301”或“标准302”之一

trans-unit.source: redis_cache_name - (Required) The name of the Redis Cache. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: redis_cache_name -（必需）Redis缓存的名称。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: redis_configuration - (Required) A redis_configuration as defined below - with some limitations by SKU - defaults/details are shown below.
trans-unit.target: redis_configuration -（必需）如下定义的 redis_configuration -受SKU的某些限制-默认/详细信息如下所示。

trans-unit.source: redis_configuration supports the following:
trans-unit.target: redis_configuration 支持以下内容：

trans-unit.source: redis_configuration - A redis_configuration block as defined below:
trans-unit.target: redis_configuration -一个 redis_configuration 块，定义如下：

trans-unit.source: redis_version - (Optional) The version of Redis software. If not provided, latest supported version will be used. Updating the version will perform an upgrade/downgrade to the new version. Currently, the supported values are REDIS_3_2 for Redis 3.2.
trans-unit.target: redis_version -（可选）Redis软件的版本。如果未提供，将使用最新的受支持版本。更新版本将执行升级/降级到新版本。当前，Redis 3.2支持的值为REDIS_3_2。

trans-unit.source: redrive_policy - (Optional) The JSON policy to set up the Dead Letter Queue, see AWS docs. Note: when specifying maxReceiveCount, you must specify it as an integer (5), and not a string ("5").
trans-unit.target: redrive_policy -（可选）用于设置Dead Letter Queue的JSON策略，请参阅 AWS docs。注意：指定 maxReceiveCount 时，必须将其指定为整数（ 5 ），而不是字符串（ "5" ）。

trans-unit.source: redshift_configuration - (Optional) Configuration options if redshift is the destination. Using redshift_configuration requires the user to also specify a s3_configuration block. More details are given below.
trans-unit.target: redshift_configuration -（可选）如果将redshift作为目的地，则为配置选项。使用 redshift_configuration 要求用户还可以指定一个 s3_configuration 块。下面给出更多细节。

trans-unit.source: redundancy - (Optional) The S3 redundancy level. Should be formatted; one of: standard, reduced_redundancy or null. Default null.
trans-unit.target: redundancy -（可选）S3冗余级别。应该格式化；：一个 standard ， reduced_redundancy 或空。默认为 null 。

trans-unit.source: ref - The ref to checkout. This can be a branch, tag, commit, etc.
trans-unit.target: ref -结帐的ref。这可以是分支，标记，提交等。

trans-unit.source: refer_config - (Optional, Type: set) Refer anti-theft chain config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consists of at most 1 item.
trans-unit.target: refer_config （可选，类型：设置）请参考加速域的防盗链配置。这是一组，最多包含1个项目。

trans-unit.source: refer_config - The refer config of the accelerated domain.
trans-unit.target: refer_config 加速域的引用配置。

trans-unit.source: refer_list - (Required, Type: list) A list of domain names of the refer config.
trans-unit.target: refer_list （必需，类型：列表）refer config的域名列表。

trans-unit.source: refer_type - (Optional) Refer type of the refer config. Valid values are block and allow. Default value is block.
trans-unit.target: refer_type （可选）参照配置的参照类型。有效值为 block 和 allow 。默认值为 block 。

trans-unit.source: reference.0.cluster_uuid - A cluster UUID generated by the Cloud Dataproc service when the job is submitted.
trans-unit.target: reference.0.cluster_uuid -提交作业时由Cloud Dataproc服务生成的集群UUID。

trans-unit.source: reference_name - (Optional) This is a reference name used in Caller Reference (helpful for identifying single delegation set amongst others)
trans-unit.target: reference_name -（可选）这是在“呼叫者参考”中使用的参考名称（有助于识别单个委派集以及其他）

trans-unit.source: reference_name - (Optional) This is a reference name used in Caller Reference (helpful for identifying single health_check set amongst others)
trans-unit.target: reference_name -（可选）这是在“呼叫者参考”中使用的参考名称（有助于识别单个health_check集以及其他）

trans-unit.source: reference_name - DEPRECATED (Optional) A reference name used when creating the Creation Token which Amazon EFS uses to ensure idempotent file system creation. By default generated by Terraform.
trans-unit.target: reference_name - DEPRECATED（可选）在创建 Creation Token 时使用的参考名称，Amazon EFS使用该参考令牌来确保创建幂等文件系统。默认情况下由Terraform生成。

trans-unit.source: referer_config - (Optional) The configuration of referer (documented below).
trans-unit.target: referer_config （可选） referer的配置（在下面记录）。

trans-unit.source: referers - (Required, Type: list) The list of referer.
trans-unit.target: referers （必填，类型：列表）引用列表。

trans-unit.source: refresh - (Optional) The SOA Refresh.
trans-unit.target: refresh -（可选）SOA刷新。

trans-unit.source: -refresh=true - Update the state for each resource prior to planning and applying. This has no effect if a plan file is given directly to apply.
trans-unit.target: -refresh=true -在计划和应用之前更新每个资源的状态。如果直接给出计划文件以应用，则这无效。

trans-unit.source: -refresh=true - Update the state prior to checking for differences.
trans-unit.target: -refresh=true -在检查差异之前更新状态。

trans-unit.source: refresh_token_validity - (Optional) The time limit in days refresh tokens are valid for.
trans-unit.target: refresh_token_validity -（可选）刷新令牌的有效期限（天）。

trans-unit.source: regex - (Optional) Regular expression to use (Only applies to the regex and regex_repeat actions.)
trans-unit.target: regex -（可选）要使用的 regex （仅适用于 regex和 regex_repeat 操作。）

trans-unit.source: regex_match_tuple - (Required) The regular expression pattern that you want AWS WAF to search for in web requests, the location in requests that you want AWS WAF to search, and other settings. See below.
trans-unit.target: regex_match_tuple -（必需）希望AWS WAF在Web请求中搜索的正则表达式模式，希望AWS WAF搜索的请求中的位置以及其他设置。见下文。

trans-unit.source: regex_pattern_set_id - (Required) The ID of a Regex Pattern Set.
trans-unit.target: regex_pattern_set_id -（必需）正则表达式模式集的ID。

trans-unit.source: regex_pattern_strings - (Optional) A list of regular expression (regex) patterns that you want AWS WAF to search for, such as B[a@]dB[o0]t.
trans-unit.target: regex_pattern_strings -（可选）您希望AWS WAF搜索的正则表达式（regex）模式的列表，例如 B[a@]dB[o0]t 。

trans-unit.source: regexp - (Required) The regular expression to match with. When using name_prefix_match, this regex is applied against the query name.
trans-unit.target: regexp -（必需）要匹配的正则表达式。当使用 name_prefix_match 时，此正则表达式将应用于查询名称。

trans-unit.source: region (Optional) - Region from which to list available zones. Defaults to region declared in the provider.
trans-unit.target: region （可选）-从中列出可用区域的区域。默认为提供程序中声明的区域。

trans-unit.source: region (Optional, Beta) The region to create the cluster in, for Regional Clusters.
trans-unit.target: region （可选， Beta）用于在区域集群中创建集群的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) An instance template is a global resource that is not bound to a zone or a region. However, you can still specify some regional resources in an instance template, which restricts the template to the region where that resource resides. For example, a custom subnetwork resource is tied to a specific region. Defaults to the region of the Provider if no value is given.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）实例模板是未绑定到区域或区域的全局资源。但是，您仍然可以在实例模板中指定一些区域资源，这会将模板限制为该资源所在的区域。例如，自定义 subnetwork 资源绑定到特定区域。如果未提供任何值，则默认为提供者的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) If specified, the AWS region this bucket should reside in. Otherwise, the region used by the callee.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）如果指定，则该存储桶应位于其中的AWS区域。否则，为被调用方使用的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) If specified, the region this bucket should reside in. Otherwise, the region used by the callee.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）如果指定，则该存储桶应位于其中的区域。否则，为被叫方使用的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) If you don't specify an AWS Region, the default is the current region.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）如果您未指定AWS区域，则默认值为当前区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Name of the region where the Oracle Java Cloud Service instance is to be provisioned. This attribute is only applicable to accounts where regions are supported. A region name must be specified if you want to use ipReservations or ipNetwork.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）将在其中配置Oracle Java Cloud Service实例的区域名称。此属性仅适用于支持区域的帐户。如果要使用ipReservations或ipNetwork，则必须指定区域名称。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Name of the region whose AWS CloudTrail account ID is desired. Defaults to the region from the AWS provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: region -其AWS CloudTrail帐户ID期望的区域的（可选）名称。默认为AWS提供程序配置中的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Name of the region whose AWS ELB HostedZoneId is desired. Defaults to the region from the AWS provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: region -其AWS ELB HostedZoneId希望该地区（可选）名称。默认为AWS提供程序配置中的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Name of the region whose AWS ELB account ID is desired. Defaults to the region from the AWS provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: region -其AWS ELB帐户ID期望的区域的（可选）名称。默认为AWS提供程序配置中的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Name of the region whose AWS Redshift account ID is desired. Defaults to the region from the AWS provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）需要使用其AWS Redshift账户ID的区域名称。默认为AWS提供程序配置中的区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) Specifies the location where the service instance is provisioned (only for accounts where regions are supported).
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）指定提供服务实例的位置（仅适用于支持区域的帐户）。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The AWS region for API calls. Defaults to us-east-1.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）API调用的AWS区域。默认为 us-east-1 。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The AWS region your group will be created in. Note: This parameter is required if you specify subnets (through subnet_ids). This parameter is optional if you specify Availability Zones (through availability_zones).
trans-unit.target: region - （可选）AWS地区的小组将在笔记中创建：如果您指定子网（通过subnet_ids）此参数是必需的。如果您指定可用区（通过Availability_zones），则此参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The Cloud Dataproc region. This essentially determines which clusters are available for this job to be submitted to. If not specified, defaults to global.
trans-unit.target: region - （可选）云Dataproc区域。这从本质上确定了可用于该作业的群集。如果未指定，则默认为 global 。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The Region in which the created address reside. If it is not provided, the provider region is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）创建的地址所在的区域。如果未提供，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The Region in which the created address should reside. If it is not provided, the provider region is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）创建的地址应位于的区域。如果未提供，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The name of the Redis region of the instance.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）实例的Redis区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which the cluster and associated nodes will be created in. Defaults to global.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）将在其中创建集群和关联节点的区域。默认为 global 。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which the cluster resides (for regional clusters).
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）群集所在的区域（对于区域群集）。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which the resource belongs. If self_link is provided, this value is ignored. If neither self_link nor region are provided, the provider region is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）资源所属的区域。如果提供了 self_link ，则将忽略此值。如果既没有 self_link 也不 region 被提供，则使用提供商区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which the resource belongs. If it is not provided, the project region is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）资源所属的区域。如果未提供，则使用项目区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which the resource belongs. If it is not provided, the provider region is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）资源所属的区域。如果未提供，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the AS configuration. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new AS configuration.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建AS配置的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的AS配置。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the AS group. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new AS group.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建AS组的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的AS组。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the AS policy. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new AS policy.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建AS策略的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建新的AS策略。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the container. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new container.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建容器的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的容器。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the eip. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new eip.
trans-unit.target: region - （可选）要在其中创建生态工业园的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的eip。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the elb health. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new elb health.
trans-unit.target: region - （可选）在其中创建ELB健康的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建新的肘部健康。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the elb listener. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new elb listener.
trans-unit.target: region - （可选）在其中创建ELB听者的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的Elb侦听器。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the loadbalancer. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new loadbalancer.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建负载均衡器的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的负载均衡器。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the server instance. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new server.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建服务器实例的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新服务器。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to create the volume. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new volume.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）在其中创建卷的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此值将创建一个新卷。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Block Storage client. A Block Storage client is needed to create a volume attachment. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new volume attachment.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2块存储客户端的区域。需要块存储客户端来创建卷附件。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此选项将创建一个新的卷附件。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. A Compute client is needed to create a floating IP that can be used with a compute instance. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new floating IP (which may or may not have a different address).
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。需要计算客户端才能创建可与计算实例一起使用的浮动IP。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的浮动IP（可能具有也可能没有其他地址）。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. A Compute client is needed to create a security group. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new security group.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。需要计算客户端才能创建安全组。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的安全组。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. A Compute client is needed to create a volume attachment. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new volume attachment.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。需要Compute客户端才能创建卷附件。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此选项将创建一个新的卷附件。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. Flavors are associated with accounts, but a Compute client is needed to create one. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new flavor.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。风味与帐户相关联，但需要Compute客户才能创建。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建新的风味。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new server group.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的服务器组。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. Keypairs are associated with accounts, but a Compute client is needed to create one. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new DNS zone.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。密钥对与帐户相关联，但需要Compute客户端才能创建一个。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的DNS区域。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. Keypairs are associated with accounts, but a Compute client is needed to create one. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new floatingip_associate.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。密钥对与帐户相关联，但需要Compute客户端才能创建一个。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的floatip_associate。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client. Keypairs are associated with accounts, but a Compute client is needed to create one. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new keypair.
trans-unit.target: region -（可选）获取V2 Compute客户端的区域。密钥对与帐户相关联，但需要Compute客户端才能创建一个。如果省略，则使用提供者的 region 参数。更改此设置将创建一个新的密钥对。

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 DNS client. A DNS client is needed to retrieve zone ids. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used.

trans-unit.source: region - (Optional) The region in which to obtain the V2 DNS client. If omitted, the region argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new DNS record set.

trans-unit.source: region - (Required) The region the instance will sit in. Note, first-generation Cloud SQL instance regions do not line up with the Google Compute Engine (GCE) regions, and Cloud SQL is not available in all regions - choose from one of the options listed here. A valid region must be provided to use this resource. If a region is not provided in the resource definition, the provider region will be used instead, but this will be an apply-time error for all first-generation instances and for second-generation instances if the provider region is not supported with Cloud SQL. If you choose not to provide the region argument for this resource, make sure you understand this.
trans-unit.target: region -（必填）实例将位于的区域。请注意，第一代Cloud SQL实例区域并非与Google Compute Engine（GCE）区域对齐，并且Cloud SQL并非在所有区域都可用-请从以下任一区域中选择这里列出的选项。必须提供有效的区域才能使用此资源。如果资源定义中未提供区域，则将使用提供者区域，但是对于所有第一代实例和第二代实例，如果Cloud SQL不支持提供者区域，这将是应用时间错误。如果您选择不为此资源提供 region 参数，请确保您理解这一点。

trans-unit.source: replace(string, search, replace) - Does a search and replace on the given string. All instances of search are replaced with the value of replace. If search is wrapped in forward slashes, it is treated as a regular expression. If using a regular expression, replace can reference subcaptures in the regular expression by using $n where n is the index or name of the subcapture. If using a regular expression, the syntax conforms to the re2 regular expression syntax.
trans-unit.target: replace(string, search, replace) -在给定的字符串上进行搜索和替换。 search 所有实例都将替换为 replace 的值。如果 search 用正斜杠包装，则将其视为正则表达式。如果使用正则表达式，则 replace 可以通过使用 $n 引用正则表达式中的子捕获，其中 n 是子捕获的索引或名称。如果使用正则表达式，则语法符合 re2正则表达式语法。

trans-unit.source: resolution - The width and height of thumbnail files in pixels, in the format WidthxHeight, where both values are even integers. The values cannot exceed the width and height that you specified in the Video:Resolution object. (To better control resolution and aspect ratio of thumbnails, we recommend that you use the thumbnail values max_width, max_height, sizing_policy, and padding_policy instead of resolution and aspect_ratio. The two groups of settings are mutually exclusive. Do not use them together)

trans-unit.source: resolve_aws_unique_ids - (Optional) If set to true, the bound_iam_principal_arn is resolved to an AWS Unique ID for the bound principal ARN. This field is ignored when bound_iam_principal_arn ends in a wildcard. Resolving to unique IDs more closely mimics the behavior of AWS services in that if an IAM user or role is deleted and a new one is recreated with the same name, those new users or roles won't get access to roles in Vault that were permissioned to the prioer principals of the same name. Defaults to true. Once set to true, this cannot be changed to false--the role must be deleted and recreated, with the value set to true.
trans-unit.target: resolve_aws_unique_ids -（可选）如果设置为 true ，则 bound_iam_principal_arn 解析为绑定主体ARN的 AWS Unique ID。当 bound_iam_principal_arn 以通配符结尾时，将忽略此字段。解析为唯一的ID更紧密地模拟了AWS服务的行为，因为如果删除了IAM用户或角色，并使用相同的名称重新创建了一个新用户，则这些新用户或角色将无法访问Vault中已获许可的角色给同名的高级校长。默认为 true 。一旦设置为 true ，则不能将其更改为 false －必须删除并重新创建角色，并将值设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: resolve_aws_unique_ids - (Optional) If set to true, the bound_iam_principal_arn is resolved to an AWS Unique ID for the bound principal ARN. This field is ignored when bound_iam_principal_arn ends in a wildcard. Resolving to unique IDs more closely mimics the behavior of AWS services in that if an IAM user or role is deleted and a new one is recreated with the same name, those new users or roles won't get access to roles in Vault that were permissioned to the prioer principals of the same name. Defaults to true. Once set to true, this cannot be changed to false--the role must be deleted and recreated, with the value set to true.
trans-unit.target: resolve_aws_unique_ids -（可选）如果设置为 true ，则 bound_iam_principal_arn 将解析为绑定主体ARN的AWS Unique ID。当 bound_iam_principal_arn 以通配符结尾时，将忽略此字段。解析为唯一的ID更紧密地模拟了AWS服务的行为，因为如果删除了IAM用户或角色，并使用相同的名称重新创建了一个新用户，则这些新用户或角色将无法访问Vault中获得许可的角色给同名的高等校长。默认为 true 。一旦设置为 true ，则不能将其更改为 false －必须删除并重新创建角色，并将值设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: resource - (Required, Type: list) List of specific objects which will be authorized. The format of each item in this list is acs:${service}:${region}:${account_id}:${relative_id}, such as acs:ecs:*:*:instance/inst-002 and acs:oss:*:1234567890000:mybucket. The ${service} can be ecs, oss, ots and so on, the ${region} is the region info which can use * replace when it is not supplied, the ${account_id} refers to someone's Alicloud account id or you can use * to replace, the ${relative_id} is the resource description section which related to the ${service}.
trans-unit.target: resource -（必需，类型：列表）将被授权的特定对象的列表。此列表中每个项目的格式为 acs:${service}:${region}:${account_id}:${relative_id} ，例如 acs:ecs:*:*:instance/inst-002 和 acs:oss:*:1234567890000:mybucket 。在 ${service} 可 ecs ， oss ， ots 等，在 ${region} 是可以使用区域信息 * 更换时不提供呢， ${account_id} 指的是某人的Alicloud帐户ID或者您也可以使用 * 代替 ${relative_id} 是与 ${service} 相关的资源描述部分。

trans-unit.source: resource - The content of this part of the ARN varies by service. It often includes an indicator of the type of resource—for example, an IAM user or Amazon RDS database —followed by a slash (/) or a colon (:), followed by the resource name itself.
trans-unit.target: resource -ARN的这一部分的内容因服务而异。它通常包括资源类型的指示符（例如，IAM用户或Amazon RDS数据库），后跟斜杠（/）或冒号（:)，然后是资源名称本身。

trans-unit.source: retire_on_delete -(Defaults to false, Forces new resources) If set to false (the default) the grants will be revoked upon deletion, and if set to true the grants will try to be retired upon deletion. Note that retiring grants requires special permissions, hence why we default to revoking grants. See RetireGrant for more information.
trans-unit.target: retire_on_delete -（默认为false，强制使用新资源）如果设置为false（默认值），则授予将在删除时撤消，如果设置为true，则授予将尝试在删除时撤消。请注意，退休赠款需要特殊的权限，因此，为什么我们默认撤销赠款。有关更多信息，请参见 RetireGrant。

trans-unit.source: retiree_principal - (Optional, Forces new resources) The principal that is given permission to retire the grant by using RetireGrant operation in ARN format. Note that due to eventual consistency issues around IAM principals, terraform's state may not always be refreshed to reflect what is true in AWS.
trans-unit.target: retiree_principal -（可选，强制使用新资源）通过使用ARN格式的RetireGrant操作，被授予撤消授权的主体。请注意，由于最终围绕IAM主体的一致性问题，不一定总是刷新terraform的状态以反映AWS中的真实情况。

trans-unit.source: retries - (Deprecated) Number of retries while waiting for a resource to be provisioned. Default value is 50. Note: This argument has been deprecated and replaced by the implementation of resource timeouts described below.
trans-unit.target: retries -（已弃用）在等待供应资源时重试的次数。默认值为50。注：不赞成使用此参数，并由下面描述的资源超时实现代替。

trans-unit.source: retries - (Optional) Maximum number of retries to perform when an API request fails. Default: 3. This can also be specified with the CLOUDFLARE_RETRIES shell environment variable.
trans-unit.target: retries -（可选）当API请求失败时要执行的最大重试次数。默认值：3。也可以使用 CLOUDFLARE_RETRIES shell环境变量来指定。

trans-unit.source: retries - (Optional) Number of retries while waiting for a resource to be provisioned. Default value is 50.
trans-unit.target: retries -（可选）在等待供应资源时重试的次数。预设值为50。

trans-unit.source: retries - (Optional) The number of retries to attempt in case of a timeout before marking the origin as unhealthy. Retries are attempted immediately. Default: 2.
trans-unit.target: retries -（可选）在将源标记为不健康之前超时的情况下要重试的次数。立即尝试重试。默认值：2

trans-unit.source: retries - (Optional, int) Consecutive failures needed to report unhealthy. Default: 0.
trans-unit.target: retries -（可选，int）报告不健康所需的连续失败。默认： 0 。

trans-unit.source: retry - (Optional) The SOA Retry.
trans-unit.target: retry -（可选）SOA重试。

trans-unit.source: retry_duration - (Optional) The length of time during which Firehose retries delivery after a failure, starting from the initial request and including the first attempt. The default value is 3600 seconds (60 minutes). Firehose does not retry if the value of DurationInSeconds is 0 (zero) or if the first delivery attempt takes longer than the current value.
trans-unit.target: retry_duration -（可选）Firehose在失败后重试传递的时间长度，从初始请求开始，包括首次尝试。默认值为3600秒（60分钟）。如果DurationInSeconds的值为0（零），或者首次交付尝试花费的时间比当前值长，Firehose不会重试。

trans-unit.source: retry_duration - (Optional) After an initial failure to deliver to Amazon Elasticsearch, the total amount of time, in seconds between 0 to 7200, during which Firehose re-attempts delivery (including the first attempt). After this time has elapsed, the failed documents are written to Amazon S3. The default value is 300s. There will be no retry if the value is 0.
trans-unit.target: retry_duration -（可选）在首次交付到Amazon Elasticsearch失败后，Firehose重新尝试交付（包括首次尝试）的总时间，以秒为单位，介于0到7200之间。经过这段时间后，失败的文档将被写入Amazon S3。默认值为300s。如果值为0，将不会重试。

trans-unit.source: retry_duration - (Optional) After an initial failure to deliver to Amazon Elasticsearch, the total amount of time, in seconds between 0 to 7200, during which Firehose re-attempts delivery (including the first attempt). After this time has elapsed, the failed documents are written to Amazon S3. The default value is 300s. There will be no retry if the value is 0.
trans-unit.target: retry_duration -（可选）在首次交付到Amazon Elasticsearch失败后，Firehose重新尝试交付（包括首次尝试）的总时间，以秒为单位，介于0到7200之间。经过这段时间后，失败的文档将被写入Amazon S3。默认值为300s。如果值为0，将不会重试。

trans-unit.source: retry_max_delay - (Optional) The maximum delay, in milliseconds, between retires made to the API. Default:5000. Can also be specified with the NSXT_RETRY_MAX_DELAY environment variable.
trans-unit.target: retry_max_delay -（可选）对API的两次退休之间的最大延迟（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： 5000 。也可以使用 NSXT_RETRY_MAX_DELAY 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: retry_min_delay - (Optional) The minimum delay, in milliseconds, between retires made to the API. Default:500. Can also be specified with the NSXT_RETRY_MIN_DELAY environment variable.
trans-unit.target: retry_min_delay -（可选）对API的两次退休之间的最小延迟（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： 500 。也可以使用 NSXT_RETRY_MIN_DELAY 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: retry_on_failure - (Optional) Whether the function should be retried on failure. This only applies to bucket and topic triggers, not HTTPS triggers.
trans-unit.target: retry_on_failure -（可选）是否应在失败时重试该函数。这仅适用于存储桶和主题触发器，不适用于HTTPS触发器。

trans-unit.source: retry_on_status_codes - (Optional) A list of HTTP status codes to retry on. By default, the provider will retry on HTTP error 429 (too many requests), essentially retrying on throttled connections. Can also be specified with the NSXT_RETRY_ON_STATUS_CODES environment variable.
trans-unit.target: retry_on_status_codes -（可选）要重试的HTTP状态代码列表。默认情况下，提供程序将在HTTP错误429（请求过多）上重试，实质上是在受限制的连接上重试。也可以使用 NSXT_RETRY_ON_STATUS_CODES 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: retry_strategy - (Optional) Specifies the retry strategy to use for failed jobs that are submitted with this job definition. Maximum number of retry_strategy is 1. Defined below.
trans-unit.target: retry_strategy -（可选）指定重试策略以用于使用此作业定义提交的失败作业。 retry_strategy 的最大数量为 1 。定义如下。

trans-unit.source: reuse_key - (Required) Is the key reusable? Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

trans-unit.target: reverse_dns -（可选）

trans-unit.source: reverse_dns - (Optional) If set to true (default), then reverse DNS records are created. If set to false, no reverse DNS records are created.
trans-unit.target: reverse_dns -（可选）如果设置为 true （默认值），则创建反向DNS记录。如果设置为 false ，则不会创建反向DNS记录。

trans-unit.source: reverse_dns - (Optional) The DNS address to which the IP address of the hosted service resolves when queried using a reverse DNS query. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: reverse_dns -（可选）使用反向DNS查询查询时，托管服务的IP地址解析为的DNS地址。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: reverse_dns_fqdn - (Optional) The reverse of the fully qualified domain name for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: reverse_dns_fqdn -（可选）托管服务的完全限定域名的反向。

trans-unit.source: reverse_fqdn - (Optional) A fully qualified domain name that resolves to this public IP address. If the reverseFqdn is specified, then a PTR DNS record is created pointing from the IP address in the in-addr.arpa domain to the reverse FQDN.
trans-unit.target: reverse_fqdn -（可选）解析为该公共IP地址的完全限定域名。如果指定了reverseFqdn，则将创建一个PTR DNS记录，该记录从in-addr.arpa域中的IP地址指向反向FQDN。

trans-unit.source: reverse_ptr - (Optional) You can specify the PTR record (reverse DNS pointer) in case of a single Floating IP address.
trans-unit.target: reverse_ptr -（可选）在单个浮动IP地址的情况下，您可以指定PTR记录（反向DNS指针）。

trans-unit.source: reverse_ptr - The PTR record (reverse DNS pointer) for this IP address. If you use an FQDN as your server name it will automatically be used here.
trans-unit.target: reverse_ptr -此IP地址的PTR记录（反向DNS指针）。如果您使用FQDN作为服务器名称，它将在此处自动使用。

trans-unit.source: revert_to_spot - (Optional) Hold settings for strategy correction – replacing On-Demand for Spot instances. Supported Values: "never", "always", "timeWindow"
trans-unit.target: revert_to_spot -（可选）保留用于策略更正的设置-替换竞价型实例的按需。支持的值： "never" ， "always" ， "timeWindow"

trans-unit.source: reviewers - (Required) A list of reviewers to use.
trans-unit.target: reviewers -（必填）要使用的审阅者列表。

trans-unit.source: revision - (Optional) Commit hash for the specified revision.
trans-unit.target: revision -（可选）为指定的版本提交哈希。

trans-unit.source: revision - (Optional) For sources that are version-aware, the revision to use.
trans-unit.target: revision -（可选）对于具有版本意识的源，是要使用的修订版。

trans-unit.source: revision - (Optional) Revision of the Configuration.
trans-unit.target: revision -（可选）修订配置。

trans-unit.source: revision - Indicates current revision number of the object as seen by NSX-T API server. This attribute can be useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: revision -指示对象的当前版本号，如NSX-T API服务器所见。此属性对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: revision - The first 9 characters of the VCS revision of the build of Consul that is running
trans-unit.target: revision -正在运行的Consul版本的VCS版本的前9个字符

trans-unit.source: revision - The revision of the job definition.
trans-unit.target: revision -作业定义的版本。

trans-unit.source: revision - The revision of the task in a particular family.
trans-unit.target: revision -特定系列中任务的修订版。

trans-unit.source: revision - The revision of this task definition
trans-unit.target: revision -此任务定义的版本

trans-unit.source: $REVISION_ID or $COMMIT_SHA: the commit SHA specified by RepoSource or resolved from the specified branch or tag.
trans-unit.target: $REVISION_ID 或 $COMMIT_SHA ：由RepoSource指定或从指定分支或标记解析的提交SHA。

trans-unit.source: revision_number - The revision number of the subnetpool.
trans-unit.target: revision_number -子网池的版本号。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration - (Optional) Nested argument containing revocation configuration. Defined below.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration -（可选）包含撤消配置的嵌套参数。定义如下。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration - Nested attribute containing revocation configuration.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration -包含撤销配置的嵌套属性。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration - Nested attribute containing configuration of the certificate revocation list (CRL), if any, maintained by the certificate authority.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration -嵌套的属性，包含由证书颁发机构维护的证书吊销列表（CRL）的配置（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.custom_cname - Name inserted into the certificate CRL Distribution Points extension that enables the use of an alias for the CRL distribution point.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.custom_cname -插入证书CRL分发点扩展名的名称，该扩展名允许对CRL分发点使用别名。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.enabled - Boolean value that specifies whether certificate revocation lists (CRLs) are enabled.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.enabled -布尔值，指定是否启用证书吊销列表（CRL）。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.expiration_in_days - Number of days until a certificate expires.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.expiration_in_days -证书过期之前的天数。

trans-unit.source: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.s3_bucket_name - Name of the S3 bucket that contains the CRL.
trans-unit.target: revocation_configuration.0.crl_configuration.0.s3_bucket_name -包含CRL的S3存储桶的名称。

trans-unit.source: revocation_statements - (Optional) The database statements to execute when revoking a user.
trans-unit.target: revocation_statements -（可选）吊销用户时要执行的数据库语句。

trans-unit.source: revoke_rules_on_delete - (Optional) Instruct Terraform to revoke all of the Security Groups attached ingress and egress rules before deleting the rule itself. This is normally not needed, however certain AWS services such as Elastic Map Reduce may automatically add required rules to security groups used with the service, and those rules may contain a cyclic dependency that prevent the security groups from being destroyed without removing the dependency first. Default false
trans-unit.target: revoke_rules_on_delete -（可选）指示Terraform在删除规则本身之前，撤销所有附加到入口和出口规则的安全组。通常不需要这样做，但是某些AWS服务（例如Elastic Map Reduce）可能会自动将必需的规则添加到与该服务一起使用的安全组中，并且这些规则可能包含循环依赖关系，以防止破坏安全组而不会先删除依赖关系。默认为 false

trans-unit.source: revoked_certificate - (Optional) One or more revoked_certificate blocks which are defined below. This setting is incompatible with the use of radius_server_address and radius_server_secret.
trans-unit.target: revoked_certificate -（可选）一个或多个下面定义的 revoked_certificate 块。此设置与 radius_server_address 和 radius_server_secret 的使用不兼容。

trans-unit.source: revoked_certificate - One or more revoked_certificate blocks which are defined below.
trans-unit.target: revoked_certificate -一个或多个下面定义的 revoked_certificate 块。

trans-unit.source: right - (Optional) A map of graph right axis options. Valid values in right include: logarithmic can be set to 0 (default) or 1; min is the min Y axis value on the right; and max is the Y axis max value on the right.
trans-unit.target: right -（可选）图形右轴选项的映射。 right 有效值包括： logarithmic 可以设置为 0 （默认值）或 1 ； min 是右边的 min Y轴值；而 max 的是Y轴右侧最大值。
